\subsubsection[{\texorpdfstring{apr\+\_\+gid\+\_\+compare}{apr_gid_compare}}]{\setlength{\rightskip}{0pt plus 5cm}\#define apr\+\_\+gid\+\_\+compare(
\begin{DoxyParamCaption}
\item[{}]{left, }
\item[{}]{right}
\end{DoxyParamCaption}
)~(((left) == (right)) ? {\bf A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+S\+U\+C\+C\+E\+SS} \+: {\bf A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+E\+M\+I\+S\+M\+A\+T\+CH})}\hypertarget{group__apr__user_gaa87aee2f533bed9dac33613fcf398713}{}\label{group__apr__user_gaa87aee2f533bed9dac33613fcf398713}
Compare two group identifiers for equality. 
\begin{DoxyParams}{Parameters}
{\em left} & One gid to test \\
\hline
{\em right} & Another gid to test \\
\hline
\end{DoxyParams}
\begin{DoxyReturn}{Returns}
A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+S\+U\+C\+C\+E\+SS if the apr\+\_\+gid\+\_\+t structures identify the same group, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+E\+M\+I\+S\+M\+A\+T\+CH if not, A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+B\+A\+D\+A\+RG if an apr\+\_\+gid\+\_\+t is invalid. 
\end{DoxyReturn}
\begin{DoxyRemark}{Remarks}
This function is available only if A\+P\+R\+\_\+\+H\+A\+S\+\_\+\+U\+S\+ER is defined. 
\end{DoxyRemark}
